::Prowl::

Prowl turns his head toward the others, frowning. "Poor creatures? Those poor creatures are long gone from this area now. Most of their tribes are now in the northern continents, and the battle is mainly on this one."

He growls. "Besides, if you want to change something, speak up about it. Ideas don't just appear in people's heads."

He then looks at Firedrill, glancing up as a large shadow passed over him and seeing the ship. He frowns but sees it fly on, looking back at Firedrill.

"What did you want to say, Firedrill?"




--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> "We call ourselves Maximals? I have never called myself a Maximal. And
> you are one to talk. I haven't seen you go to any lengths to protect the
> poor creatures you took this war to." Cliffjumper only gets angrier as
> he is faced with Prowls back. "We aren't giving up Prowl, we are just
> changing our Strategey." Cliffjumper turns around with flaring nostrils,
> and transforms. "Come on guys." he says, as he slowly begins to drive
> off.
> 
> Firedrill looks on to both parties, "Prowl, no I." he then looks back
> confused at Cliffjumper.
